briefTitle: Interleukin-1 Blockade in Recently Decompensated Heart Failure
officialTitle: Interleukin-1 Blockade in Recently Decompensated Heart Failure: A Randomized Placebo-controlled Double-blinded Study

interventions.name: Anakinra (weeks 3-12)
otherNames: Anakinra 100 mg daily for weeks 3 through 12

summary: The RED-HART is a randomized double-blinded placebo-controlled study of Anakinra (IL-1 blocker) in patients with recently decompensated heart failure to determine the safety and efficacy in terms of aerobic exercise capacity and ventilatory efficiency measured with a cardiopulmonary exercise test.

primaryOutcome.measure: Interval Changes in Peak Oxygen Consumption (VO2)
